title: Hover Underline Animation
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a hover underline animation using CSS. This effect can be used to add visual interest to text and improve the user experience of a website. By following the steps outlined in this lab, you will gain a better understanding of how to use CSS to create dynamic and engaging web content.
